!Ulu Kaimu: (Show the item to Ulu Kaimu). Hmmm... This recalls memories of.... The blessing of water...my mother Shilen... I also remember Shilen's wisdom -- and her concern about the dinosaurs. But I don't think my memories are the wisdom you seek. Go to my other brother Kaimus and show them the item and receive their wisdom...
